structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: The administration of the building or buildings constituted into a condominium property regime shall be governed by bylaws approved and adopted by the council of co-owners. The bylaws may be amended from time to time by vote of a majority of the council.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 8. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 205, sec. 12.
